parameters.label: LLM Model
parameters.tooltip: Select the language model used for generating responses. Changes apply immediately to new queries.

parameters.label: Embedding Model
parameters.tooltip: Select the embedding model used for query vectorization. Changing this may affect retrieval quality.

parameters.label: Temperature
parameters.tooltip: Controls randomness in generation. Lower values make output more focused and deterministic, higher values more creative and diverse.

parameters.label: Top K Results
parameters.tooltip: Number of top chunks to retrieve from vector search before expansion and reranking. Higher values increase recall but also processing time.

parameters.label: Chunk Weight
parameters.tooltip: Weight for chunk-based results in hybrid retrieval. Higher values prioritize direct document matches over entity-filtered results.

parameters.label: Entity Weight
parameters.tooltip: Weight for entity-filtered results in hybrid retrieval. Higher values prioritize results that match extracted entities from your query.

parameters.label: Path Weight
parameters.tooltip: Weight for path-based results in multi-hop reasoning. Higher values prioritize results found through entity relationship traversal.

parameters.label: Min Retrieval Similarity
parameters.tooltip: Minimum similarity threshold for retrieved chunks to be considered relevant. Lower values increase recall but may reduce precision.

parameters.label: Max Hops
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of relationship hops to traverse when following entity connections. Higher values explore deeper relationships but increase query time.

parameters.label: Beam Size
parameters.tooltip: Number of top paths to maintain during multi-hop search. Higher values explore more alternative paths but increase computation.

parameters.label: Graph Expansion Depth
parameters.tooltip: Maximum depth for expanding the knowledge graph around retrieved chunks. 0 disables expansion, higher values find more related context.

parameters.label: Max Expanded Chunks
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of chunks to keep after graph expansion. Limits memory usage and downstream LLM context size.

parameters.label: Expansion Similarity Threshold
parameters.tooltip: Minimum similarity required for chunks to be included during graph expansion. Higher values produce tighter, more relevant expansions.

parameters.label: Enable Reranker
parameters.tooltip: Enable post-retrieval reranking using FlashRank. Improves result ordering but requires FlashRank to be installed.

parameters.label: Rerank Blend Weight
parameters.tooltip: Blend weight between the original hybrid score and the rerank score. 0 uses pure rerank ordering, 1 uses original ordering.

parameters.label: Reranker Model
parameters.tooltip: Select which FlashRank model to use for reranking. Different models offer tradeoffs between speed and accuracy.

parameters.label: Restrict to Context Documents
parameters.tooltip: When enabled, limits retrieval to documents explicitly provided in the chat context. Disable to search across all ingested documents.
